SELECT COUNT(*) AS STATE_COUNT FROM TB_PLAN
WHERE
PLAN_STATE = 'Y' AND ( PLAN_START_DATE LIKE '%'||#{searchDay}||'%' OR PLAN_END_DATE LIKE '%'||#{searchDay}||'%' )

SELECT TP.PLAN_ENROLL_DATE, TP.PLAN_START_DATE, TP.PLAN_END_DATE, TP.PLAN_NO, TP.PLAN_TITLE, TP.PLAN_STATE, TMP.DAYS, RANK() OVER(PARTITION BY TMP.DAYS ORDER BY PLAN_STATE DESC,PLAN_ENROLL_DATE) AS DAY_RANK FROM (SELECT TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(#{startDay},'YYYYMMDD')+LEVEL-1,'YYYYMMDD') AS DAYS FROM DUAL CONNECT BY LEVEL <= TO_DATE(#{endDay}, 'YYYYMMDD') - TO_DATE(#{startDay},'YYYYMMDD')+1)TMP , TB_PLAN TP
WHERE
(TMP.DAYS = SUBSTR(TP.PLAN_START_DATE,1,8) OR TMP.DAYS = SUBSTR(TP.PLAN_END_DATE,1,8))
GROUP BY
TMP.DAYS, TP.PLAN_TITLE, TP.PLAN_NO, TP.PLAN_ENROLL_DATE, TP.PLAN_START_DATE, TP.PLAN_END_DATE, TP.PLAN_STATE
ORDER BY TP.PLAN_ENROLL_DATE,DAYS

SELECT COUNT(*) AS MONTHCOUNT
FROM TB_PLAN
WHERE
PLAN_START_DATE >= #{startDay} AND PLAN_START_DATE <= #{endDay}

SELECT TMP.DAYS AS DAYS,COUNT(*) AS CONTENT_COUNT FROM
(SELECT TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(#{startDay},'YYYYMMDD')+LEVEL-1,'YYYYMMDD') AS DAYS
FROM DUAL CONNECT BY LEVEL <= TO_DATE(#{endDay}, 'YYYYMMDD') - TO_DATE(#{startDay},'YYYYMMDD')+1)TMP ,TB_PLAN TP
WHERE
TMP.DAYS = SUBSTR(TP.plan_start_date,1,8)
OR
TMP.DAYS = SUBSTR(TP.plan_END_date,1,8) GROUP BY TMP.DAYS ORDER BY DAYS

SELECT
PLAN_NO, PLAN_ENROLL_DATE, PLAN_START_DATE, PLAN_END_DATE, PLAN_UPDATE_DATE, PLAN_TITLE, PLAN_CONTENT, PLAN_STATE
FROM TB_PLAN
WHERE PLAN_NO = #{no}

SELECT
PLAN_NO, PLAN_ENROLL_DATE, PLAN_START_DATE, PLAN_END_DATE, PLAN_UPDATE_DATE, PLAN_TITLE, PLAN_CONTENT, PLAN_STATE FROM TB_PLAN
WHERE ( PLAN_START_DATE LIKE '%'||#{searchDay}||'%'
OR
PLAN_END_DATE LIKE '%'||#{searchDay}||'%' )
ORDER BY PLAN_START_DATE ASC
